item.title: Problem with end else
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:5, topic:169053”][quote author=Shadower link=topic=228712.msg1963276#msg1963276 date=1199029243]
Eh, I know the script makes no sense lol, now that I think about it. But why does it say identifier expected?
[/quote]

I told you, there is no main loop. Add a “begin end.” to the end of the script and it will work.[/quote]

My mistake. I copied it wrong.

procedure haha; var Path, Extension: string; begin Path := 'C:\Documents and Settings\User\Desktop\damn'; Extension := '.bmp'; if(Iskeydown(chr(13)))then begin if I = I- 1 then Savescreenshot(Path + (IntToStr(I)) + Extension); else begin I := I + 1; Savescreenshot(Path + (IntToStr(I)) + Extension); end; end;

Cleaned it up a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with end else
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

" if I = I- 1 then;"
Huh?

Also there’s 1 too many end;'s

and there is a semi-color after all of the “then”'s

For changing the value of a variable in SCAR it is :=
" I = I + 1;" <> " I := I + 1;"

[code]program New;

var I: integer;

procedure haha;
begin
if(Iskeydown(chr(13)))then
begin
if I = I- 1 then
begin
Savescreenshot(‘C:\Documents and Settings\User\Desktop\damn’+(inttostr(I))+’.bmp’);end else
begin
I := I + 1;
Savescreenshot(‘C:\Documents and Settings\User\Desktop\damn’+ (inttostr(I))+’.bmp’);
end;
end;
end;

begin
repeat
haha;
until(false);
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with end else
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Shadower:

Eh, I know the script makes no sense lol, now that I think about it. But why does it say identifier expected?

I told you, there is no main loop. Add a “begin end.” to the end of the script and it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with end else
item.dc:creator: @Shadower Shadower
item.description:
@Shadower wrote:

[code]program New;

var I: integer;

procedure haha;
begin
if(Iskeydown(chr(13)))then;
begin
if I = I- 1 then;
begin
Savescreenshot(‘C:\Documents and Settings\User\Desktop\damn’+(inttostr(I))+’.bmp’);end else
begin
I = I + 1;
Savescreenshot(‘C:\Documents and Settings\User\Desktop\damn’+ (inttostr(I))+’.bmp’);
end;
end;
end;
end;

begin
repeat
haha;
until(false);
end.[/code]

It keeps saying identifier expected on the end else line, could anyone help me please? Thanks.

Read full topic
